title: Teaching
philosophy: Dedicated to empowering the next generation of geospatial experts. My approach fosters critical thinking, hands-on skills, and an understanding of how GIS and digital geographies can be ethically applied to address pressing societal challenges. I aim to create an inclusive and interactive learning environment.

courses.title: Selected Topics in GIS
courses.description: Solutions to spatial problems with modern GIS-based approaches.

courses.title: Advanced GIS Analysis
courses.description: In-depth exploration of advanced geospatial analysis techniques using modern GIS tools.

courses.title: Introduction to GIS and digital geographies
courses.description: Introduces the foundational concepts of GIS and digital geographies using webGIS.

courses.title: Géoinformatique opérationnelle : Développement avancé d'outils
courses.description: Discovering concepts and tools to organize the front-end side of a web application and enrich the user interface/experience according to current good practices.
